name: Axpo Holding AG
membership:
Axpo is a member of EFET (European Federation of Energy Traders) and WindEurope (European Wind Energy Association). The paid membership fees are included in “Estimate of the annual costs related to activities covered by the register”. 
Axpo is also active in Eurelectric (Union of the Electricity Industry).
goal:
Axpo Group reliably produces, trades and sells energy for over 3 million people and thousands of companies in Switzerland and over 30 European countries. About 4500 employees combine the expertise from 100 years of climate-friendly electricity production with innovative power for a sustainable energy future.
The Axpo Group comprises Axpo Holding AG with headquarters in Baden and its subsidiaries Axpo Power AG, Axpo Trading AG, Avectris AG and Centralschweizerischen Kraftwerke AG (CKW). Axpo is wholly owned by the cantons of Northeastern Switzerland.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Clean Energy for All Europeans legislative proposals:
- Review of retail energy market / new electricity market design
- Review of Renewables Directive
- Review of Energy Efficiency Directive
Review of Emission Trading System
Linking EU and Swiss Emission Trading Systems
Review of MiFID: MiFID II
Corporate social responsibility Post-2014: Strategy
Nuclear Illustrative Programme, PINC
